name.ja: <ruby>機<rt>き</rt></ruby><ruby>動<rt>どう</rt></ruby><ruby>石<rt>せっ</rt></ruby><ruby>器<rt>き</rt></ruby>ドグラード

text.en:
2+ monsters, including a Rock monster
If this card is Special Summoned: You can target 1 Rock monster in your GY; this card gains ATK equal to that monster's. During your opponent's Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can target 1 other monster on the field with ATK less than or equal to this card; this card loses ATK equal to that monster's, and if it does, destroy that monster. You can only use each effect of "Dogurado the Moving Stone Relic" once per turn.
